section.title: layerinfo declarations
section.para: You can use the layerinfo declaration to set arbitrary meta-data for a layer. However, certain meta-data keys and values are required for each type of layer.

At minimum, all that's required to create a valid layer is one layerinfo declaration with name "type", stating the type of the layer. Depending on the layer type, more declarations may be required. Valid types are those listed in the Layers section.

listitem.simpara: name of layer, shown on website to users if supplied
